Type

Custom fonts are loaded via JavaScript provided by fonts.com.

$font-primary
HelveticaNeue-Light, Helvetica Neue Light, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Lucida Grande, sans-serif
font-secondary
Arial, Verdana, sans-serif
